Comment: That JD show on PBS has promise. Though it would require an 18+ label.

Comment: The SecEd McMahon was on the podcast circuit babbling about how 1st graders are gonna learn A1. She kept saying A1 like she had full grasp of the topic. What are kids gonna do with A1? Pour it on their steaks during lunch?  The Chinese Minister of Ed. holds a Ph.d, MS and BS degrees. Linda McMahon holds a BA in French, whatever that means.  Our kids are doomed to fail moving forward.
